House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance

official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to limit unauthorized use of credit cards by discouraging theft of credit cards that are mailed.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to set a deadline by which the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and certain agencies are required to issue regulations designed to discourage theft of credit cards that are mailed.

titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to limit unauthorized use of credit cards by discouraging theft of credit cards that are mailed.
